profileAlternative.name: Vy Nguyen
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Amazon
profileAlternative.summary:
I have seven years of professional experience with a passion for using data to drive business decisions and leveraging on Data Science to solve business challenges. My background in entrepreneurship, product management and consulting gives me strong product sense and allows me to bring valuable business insights to the data I analyzed. I have in-depth knowledge of applied econometrics and statistics as well as statistical programming language such as R, STATA, SQL and Python.

Identifying patterns and extracting meaningful stories from data is one of my interests. I have worked with consumer financial transaction data, demographic data, as well as text data. I'm currently working on projects that employ machine learning algorithms such as topic modeling, KNN, random forests, neural network, etc. as well as regression models.

Formerly, I was a Product Manager for data-driven financial and e-commerce products, a Consultant on risk-related topics to global investment banks and MNCs and most recently, a Co-Founder of a technology start-up.

I'm an avid traveler who has been to more than 30 countries and 70 cities (and still counting!) around the world and has forged life-time friendships with other global citizens. Beside traveling, I enjoy hiking, cooking and practicing yoga.

given.text: Barath is a very impressive scientist. Barath is someone who is always acutely aware about the balance between scientific rigor and practicality as well as business application in his work. His ability to juggle multiple complex projects, spanning several scientific domains, is exceptional and widely recognized/respected not only by peers, but also by the senior leaders. He is not only highly intelligent, knowledgeable but also has a very high level of emotional intelligence which makes him an awesome colleague, an amazing mentor and a super cool scientist. If you have a chance to work with Barath, youâ€™ll learn so much from him and will grow equally fast. See less

items: Advanced Data Analysis with Statistical Programming Language R
Data Science in R and ISLR
Theory and Application of Pattern Recognition (Machine Learning)
